text: Holy Angels School is a higher-secondary co-education private school in Rajpura, Patiala, Punjab. The school was founded in 1975 and is affiliated to the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education of India. The principal of the school currently is P. M. Philip. Thomas Kunapalli was the former principal of the school.Moreover Holy Angels School is one of the best school in the city. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 1975 Category:1975 establishments in India
title: Holy Angels School
